body.raw:
# Flex

## Import

```jsx live=false
import { Flex, Spacer } from '@totejs/uikit';
```

- **Flex**: A `Box` with `display: flex`.
- **Spacer**: Creates an adjustable, empty space that can be used to tune the spacing between child elements within `Flex`.

## Usage

```jsx
<Flex color="white">
  <Center w="100px" bg="scene.success.normal">
    <Text>Box 1</Text>
  </Center>
  <Square bg="scene.danger.normal" size="150px">
    <Text>Box 2</Text>
  </Square>
  <Box flex="1" bg="scene.warning.normal">
    <Text>Box 3</Text>
  </Box>
</Flex>
```

### Using the Spacer

```jsx
<Flex>
  <Box p={16} bg="scene.success.normal">
    Box 1
  </Box>
  <Spacer />
  <Box p={16} bg="scene.warning.normal">
    Box 2
  </Box>
</Flex>
```

      desc: 'Shorthand for flexWrap style prop',
    },
  ]}
/>
